page.title: 06INDUSTRY-(LIGHT).Headcorn.
page.content: On the North side of the{A274}is the depot of a local{Haulage Contractor, {(A.A.LOCK)}whose Heavy Goods Vehicles transport various goods all over the country.These include bulk liquid tankers that collect fuel oil from refineries and deliver it to customers nationwide. {KENT COUNTY COUNCIL }also have a small depot in the same yard. The only other light industry in this part of{HEADCORN village}is a small factory which processes Frozen Food, {(ORCHARD SERVICES) }Soft fruits and vegetables are brought here from all over Kent to be washed, graded and frozen.The packs are then distributed wholesale to Chain Stores and Food shop retailers.Cleanliness is vital when dealing with food,so the factory staff wear White overall coats and hats.Students on vacation are employed here during the busy Summer months.
